meanings.definition: A compound containing antimony and another element.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied various antimonides in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Miners discovered valuable antimonides in the underground caves.
meanings.sent3: The antimonides in the chemistry experiment decided to throw a party.
meanings.sent4: Her jewelry box sparkled with antimonides of different colors.
meanings.sent5: The antimonides in the rock formation glowed under the UV light.

meanings.sent1: The collection included many antimonides from different regions.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed ancient antimonides found in tombs.
meanings.sent3: The antimonides at the party all wore matching hats.
meanings.sent4: The antimonides in the orchestra played harmoniously together.
meanings.sent5: The antimonides on the shelf gleamed in the sunlight.
